The AI-Coreutils project has successfully completed all three phases:

### Phase 2: Enhanced Features (100% Complete)

### Phase 3: Polish & Scale (100% Complete)

**Final Statistics:**

- 41 tests passing

- Full cross-platform support (Linux, macOS, Windows)
- Three language bindings (Rust core, Python, Node.js)

The project is ready for release (v0.1.0) or any new feature development you'd like to pursue!
